data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 42,100 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Couva-Tabaquite-Talparo, Trinidad and Tobago
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Couva-Tabaquite-Talparo, Trinidad and Tobago.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Couva-Tabaquite-Talparo.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, of the 77,208 people in the state of Couva-Tabaquite-Talparo who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Tabaquite
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Tabaquite, Couva-Tabaquite-Talparo, Trinidad and Tobago.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Couva-Tabaquite-Talparo, Trinidad and Tobago to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 136,400 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Couva-Tabaquite-Talparo prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Couva-Tabaquite-Talparo.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
